metadata.title: Movements not fueled by emotions alone; Ikhtiar Wali Khan

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 09 (APP):Prime Minister's Coordinator on Information, Broadcasting and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Affairs, Ikhtiar Wali Khan, has said that movements are not driven by emotions alone-they rise on the foundation of trust, unity, and principled leadership. In a post on X on Wednesday, Ikhtiar Wali Khan remarked that "How can those who are unsure of their own standing bear the weight of a movement that still lives in dreams?"
